column4: I need help regarding CGI Scripts on Ubuntu. My router uses .cgi files which dont run on Firefox and Opera both. What should i do ??
this is not a problem that Ubuntu can fix.
this is not a problem that you can solve from Ubuntu. Its a problem with your router.
not sure what you are talking about, but /etc/fstab is not for making disks faster. Are you talking about the UID?
